choices: felt something itch under her foot
finished up, now to shower off
finished up, now it was time for cardio
114.content:
BANG!

You woke up as the sound of an explosion roared above your head. As your heart hammered, you saw that you were bound to what appeared to be a massive red cylindrical building. What was even more shocking was the figure that towered even higher before you. You looked up to see the withdrawing arm of Gina Carano passed over you like a floating roadway. As her tan, muscular body tensed up again, you couldn’t even begin to prepare yourself for what came next.

BAM!

You couldn't even scream as Gina’s fist slammed directly into your body, bending it under the force like a piece of rubber. Your bones creaked under the force of the blow, even though most of it was directed around you thanks to good fortune putting you between Gina’s fingers, the pain was still tremendous. The fist drew back as quickly as it had shot out, spanning no longer than a fraction of a second, but spanning for hours as far as you were concerned. As you struggled to get your breath back, you saw as Gina began to turn…

BAM!

You felt the warm tingle of urine running down your leg as Gina’s massive elbow sunk into the sandbag next to you. Her elbow quickly withdrew as she spun around the other way…

BAM!

You screamed as her heel brushed lightly against you, having sunk deeply into the bag as well. Looking over, you gulped as you saw her rough sole crushing the bag underneath it, having barely missed crushing you as well by the smallest margin. As her leg returned, you felt the bag begin to spin ever so slightly.

BAM!....CRUNCH!

Screaming, you looked down at your right arm, crushed into a disfigured mess beneath Gina’s other heel as she performed another roundhouse kick. The pain continued to sear as Gina twisted her heel, pulling her leg back. As the hot tears began running down your cheek, you looked up at the giant warrior, wondering what you had done to deserve a fate like this. As the pain continued to torment you, your eyes involuntarily shut in pain. As they opened, you saw the quickly approaching sole of Gina’s foot launching at you…

BOOM!.... SNAP!

You moaned as her sole began to press down on you, having already broken your ribs and leaving you with very little sensation in your lower extremities. The sweat that covered her slick sole was soaking into your clothing, the salt from it stinging your wounds. You were in hell underneath her warm, sweaty soles, and as her foot withdrew, and you came along with it, you wondered if this would be the end of it all.

BAM!

As Gina’s foot landed in the mat on top of you, you began to struggle feebly under it, out of nothing more than pure reflex. When her foot began grinding and spinning on top of you, you began to pass out. Meanwhile, Gina above you….
114.title: Gina in Control

12.content: what type of volleyball beach or indoor?
12.title: Volleyball

122.content: which team finds you Canada's? or The United States
122.title: Indoor

1221.content: which player finds you from the team?
1221.title: Canada's

12211.content: Brittney Page are you sure?
12211.title: captain Brittney Page

14.content: Who do you shrink by/with?
14.title: Golf

142.content: Where do you shrink before Michelle Wie?
142.title: Where do you shrink?

choices: Look up, seeing Michelle Wie smiling down at you!
Look up, seeing Michelle Wie looking for her shoes.
1421.content:
You are a 20 something year old janitor mopping the floors inside the womens locker room. Even tho cleaning up after others is all you are good at in life, you arent ashamed to admit this job has its own personal benefits to you. Like today, LPGA figure michelle wie is playing on the course today and you hope to get an autograph later. And to make things even more better, after a practice round, Michelle left her golf sneakers and socks next to her locker and changed into flip flops to do some more interviews with fans and press. You look around, then pull Michelle's sweaty sock out of her nike golf sneaker and take a small whiff. The smell is quite strong and turns you on. You then bring the dirty grass stained golf sneaker to your nose and inhale the stink from it to. This is truely heaven for you. Just then, somebody hits you across the head and you are knocked out cold.....


When you awake, you see everything around is much larger than before! In fact, the bench in front of the lockers is hundreds of feet tall. You must be the size of an ant now! Just then you hear a door slam and-
1421.title: In a locker room

14211.content:
"Well well. Another little man trying to get a taste of wie-zilla?? Hahaha!!" Michelle roars in laughter! 24 year old Michelle Wie has just got done with a practice tournament and is super hot and sweaty.

"Cover your nose. Because this is going to stink quite bad...." Michelle promises as she removes her wet grass stained golf sneakers from her feet. She brings one of them up to her face and sniffs, shuddering!

"Stinky......." Michelle comments as she removes her socks next revealing her gorgeous sweaty soles! She points at you and you already get the idea!
14211.title: Michelle wie pwns you!

choices: fell off her cleat, right in front of Alex Morgan's
stayed stuck to them until she kicks them off in the locker room
1511.content:
“FUCK!” You shouted as the ground behind you seemed to explode like a mortar shell had been dropped on it. As you hit the wet dirt and covered the back of your neck, you cringed and flinched as bits of mud, grass, and dirt fell on you like a solid rain.

BOOM!...BOOM!

“I’m taking another shot Hope, better be ready,” you heard Alex Morgan say, her voice echoing from her titanic body above you. You shivered knowing another bomb was about to drop as you ducked down into the wet grass as deeply as possible. A gust of wind blew overhead as Morgan’s foot zipped above your shrunken body by mere millimeters, kicking a soccer ball the size of a Disney World attraction at an equally massive Hope Solo.

BAM!

As the ball was reflected off of Hope’s hands and came bouncing back towards you, the sense of impending doom that followed it dawned on you. No amount of running or ducking you could manage would save you as the ball grew closer and closer, encompassing your entire felid of vision… BAM! You were flung backwards as the ball landed on you, sticking you to its surface as the wet dew grabbed you like watery chains. The ball rolled to Alex Morgan’s feet as she reeled back her foot to deliver one last powerful shot to the ball (http://www.dailyrepublic.com/files/2012/...).

BOOM!

You were in shock as the ball bounced off of Hope’s hands, knocking you off and to the ground right at her feet. Groaning, you tried to get up, but failed to notice Hope shifting as the ball rolled back towards Morgan. You were totally unaware that her cleat clad foot was coming down on your poor body. Feeling in slow motion as her cleat pressed down on you, it was like a bad horror film. Your face and finally your whole body was pressed into the middy ground, sinking in like it was quicksand. The moist ground was all that kept you from being killed under Hope’s foot, but as she lifted her foot up once more, you almost wish that you were already gone! You were brought up along with a lump of mud as you became stuck to Hope’s cleat. As the two players began walking towards the locker room, you…
1511.title: Hopeless Situation

1512.content: You awake in the locker room of he soccer teams you came to see, but somethings wrong. You seem to have shrunk! But that's not all youre in the Olympic star player Hope Solo's....
1512.title: Locker Room Mishap!

choices: Climb up her socked foot to freedom
Too late  Hope shifts and you roll under her socked foot!
15121.content:
The walls of the cleat rise up all around, like a white bowl. The sheer height of the walls dwarfs you as you sit in Hope’s size 10 cleats. As you get your senses back, you discover how badly your sense of smell has been under attack in here! You start coughing and wheezing as the constricting smell of Hope’s well worn cleats chokes you. You staggered as your lungs burned, pushing you to find fresh air! But a new problem was now hanging over your head… literally! You turned and ran as Hope’s massive, sock-clad foot slowly drew towards the cleat!

Your legs and lungs burned as you tried to outrun the goalie’s massive toes. You turned around just in time to see her big toe gently touch down on the damaged fabric lining the heel of her cleat. Suddenly, your foot hit a fold in the insole’s fabric and you were sent spiraling to the floor. You groaned as your mouth got a full taste of Solo’s sweat, the residual from her last game still clinging onto the fabric of her insole. A dark shadow fell over you as you turned around to see Hope’s sole hover over you ominously. Closing your eyes, you braced for impact as….

“There we go!” Hope said as she slid her right foot all the way into her cleat. She tied her laces tightly as she flexed her toes inside the cleat to make sure it was a good fit. Annoyed, she felt some sort of pebble under the ball of her foot. She didn’t want to take the cleat off after just getting it on, so she instead stood on her tip-toes and tapped her foot trying to get the stubborn rock to fall. As she slammed her foot a third time, she felt the annoyance dislodge and fall pleasantly between her toes. “Ah! Much better!” she cooed as she wrapped her sock-clad toes around the small lump against her sock.

You struggled against the grip of Hope’s toes, but the soccer-star’s foot was too strong for you. As Hope began moving, you noticed she had a bad habit of grinding her toes together, or maybe she was just intrigued with you. Either way, with every step the gorgeous athlete took, her toes rubbed against you roughly, almost dislocating your arm on several steps! The smell in her cleat wasn’t getting any better either as Hope stepped out of the air conditioned lockers into the heat of their first game. The thermometer read a high 82 for the day, and Hope’s toes were ready to work up a sweat just for you.

You needed to find a way out of this mess. Looking around, you saw a small hole in Hope’s sock just above the nail of her big toe. You decided you could either try to make the hole bigger and crawl through… or you could try your luck giving Hope’s toe a quick nip. It was risky either way. As Hope’s toes constricted around you one last time you made your choice… you were going to…..
15121.title: Hopes Crushed

choices: After a couple saves, Hope needs to drink more water
After a couple saves, Hope pours some water on her neck
15122.content: you find yourself in a giant pond like area. you look around but there are walls to this pond. all of a sudden you see a giant hand reach around and grab what you are in. HOPES WATER BOTTLE, you say anxiously. she is running out onto the field for the start of the game against Costa Rica. it is a super sunny and hot day out so you know that she will be drinking alot of water. you dont know how you feel about this situation yet. as Hope runs, the bottle shakes swishing and tossing you around the bottle. she finally arrives at the net and you see her open the bottle top and bring it to her giant beautiful lips. she tips the bottle and you start moving towards her open mouth. you start swimming against the current flowing into her mouth. just before you are about to exit the bottle, hope tips it upright and you are safe in the bottle....for now. she closes the bottle and you see her kind of look in the bottle at you, almost like she knows you are there. "that was close" you say to yourself. hope sets the bottle down in the net and walks away. as she walks away, you cant help but stare at her amazingly perfect ass as it swings as she walks. she turns and walks back to the goal line and turn back around to do some stretches. she first stretches her groin by squatting down right over top of the water bottle and you. you look up and all you see is hopes giant ass looking like its about to sit on you. you never seen such a big ass before! she then stands up and bends forward to stretch her legs. after shes done stretching, you hear the game whistle blow and the game has started!
15122.title: water bottle

choices: in front of the goalie net
15123.title: other

151231.content:
ADIDAS

The word looked at you plainly as you lay still on your back. You were frozen to your spot like someone had nailed you to the floor. Looking up, you were transfixed as you watched Hope slowly strip her socks off. You could hear the sweat cling to the fabric as a sound similar to tape being peeled off resounded in your ears. One of these huge black socks fell onto the sandal you were sitting on. As it ran across the toe section, a wave of Hope’s aroma washed over you. After a long game, the smell wasn’t roses to say the least. Chocking, you tried desperately to move, but as Hope’s foot hovered over you, you knew it was too late.

Hope sighed as she slowly slid her feet into her sandals. She stretched as she wiggled her hot toes feverishly. Her body was sore all over, and her feet were killing her! As soon as she got home she decided she was going to take a nice long bath and try to relax for once. They had lost the game, and Hope was kicking herself (figuratively) for letting those two shots in. She knew she was better than that! Frustrated, she ground her foot into her flip flop and stormed out of the locker room.

You wondered what would become of you as you found your body pressed against Hope’s arch. Looking around, you were dismayed to see strings and lint form her socks that were the same size as you.

“HOPE! HELP ME! I’M A FAN OF YOURS!” you shout from Hope’s arch. No answer.

You sighed; you really hadn’t expected anything else. But you were thankful for two things. One, you managed to get stuck on the very edge of Hope’s arch, so she wasn’t stepping on you. And most importantly of all, number 2, that sock had taken most of the sweat off of Hope’s feet. Tired, you decided to rest while Hope drove home, no use getting flustered just yet….

You woke up to the familiar back and forth swinging of Hope’s long strides. Looking around, you saw you were in her house, but you weren’t sure just where yet. Before you could get your bearings though, you were already in danger as you saw Hope….
151231.title: Riding Solo

choices: Hide under Hope's cleat, between the treads!
Run far away from the shoe, taking your chances with her sweat!
151232.content:
What a game!

It was always so refreshing to return to the field after a big game to see the empty stadium, the tattered grass, and scoreboard still displaying your teams winning score. It was a habit you had made since you started playing soccer as a kid, your own personal victory lap.

And this time had started like all the others. It had been a night game, and the cool night air gave your skin a refreshing chill. Still in your cleats and soccer uniform, you held your gym bag in one hand, while the other hand swung idly by your side as you walked. You reached the opposing team's goal, and turned around to face the field, smiling a little. After a few seconds of basking in your own glory, you hear something above you, and you look up, just as the lights of the field turn on again. Caught off guard, the bright light blinds you and you stumble back a few steps, before tripping over your own feet. Things begin to get dark rather quickly, and you lose consciousness before you even hit the ground.

You wake up, smelling the grass and noting the silence of the empty field. Whatever had just happened had come on like a 16-wheeler. You sit up, and your head throbs painfully, but you manage to peel your eyes open to take a gander at the scene around you.

Grass. Not just regular grass, tree and building sized blades of grass that tower over your head like you were in deep forest. Something is very obviously not right...were you...tiny?

Absolutely minuscule is more like it. An ant may appear to be the size of a horse to you. Your first thought of encountering one had given you another chill, this one not so refreshing. No time to stand around, standing around is what got you here, action was required! After a quick look around, you see that your bag was shrunken as well, and you still had your clothes and cleats on. Inside the bag you had a full change of clothes, a bottle of water, a sports drink, some trail mix, and a few other items. Grabbing your bag, you lift your leg to take the first step of what you expected to be a hellish, long journey out of the field.

However, apparently you arent the only one who enjoys the solitude of the empty soccer field after a game. Though you couldn't feel the ground tremble as you might have expected to, the sound of cleats shuffling through the grass is unmistakable, even at the size. Someone was coming.

Above you, Hope Solo has re-entered the field, possibly to relive the misstep that caused her to slide just inches shy of knocking your game-winning goal away from the goal. Naturally, with you standing next to the goal, it won't be long before Hope's cleat missteps again, this time with a much, much greater penalty to you.

You immediately begin to run in the opposite direction of Hope's towering form, also still in her soccer uniform, and still sweating just a bit. It doesn't take long for the goddess of a soccer player to catch you, and your world is cast in the shadow of her cleat. As she lifts the foot to place it on the ground, and you, chunks of dirt and soil tumble haphazardly through the air. Screaming, you dive to the ground to avoid a bus-sized chunk of mud still lodged under the brunette bombshell's shoe. It explodes into pieces as it hits the ground, covering you in it's dusty, grimy debris, and you swore you'd just lived through a cherry bomb explosion.

And though you survived a single projectile launched from your rival's immense shoe, the owner of the shoe was not quite done with you yet.

Your attempt to escape her powerful, towering cleat treads is mostly successful. Hope's shoe-clad foot crashes into the ground scaled inches from your ankle, as you lay their cowering in her wake. From this perspective, you can see clear up to her shorts. Above that, though, you might as well be looking past the clouds.

Being so tiny provides you a temporary blissful ignorance though, as you don't notice the beading of sweat on Hope's forehead. You do notice, however, the leather of Hope's cleat shifting and adjusting toe the wiggling toes that lay inside it. Upon closer inspection, you realize that these idle toe-wigglings are not for the sake of wiggling.

Above you, Hope has gotten frustrated with her inability to decipher what she did wrong. She lifts her right hand to drag gently across her forehead, while her left hand brings a water bottle up to her lips. Simultaneously, she begins tapping that right foot, the one that you are residing beside.

Those beads of sweat that had begun to trickle down the woman's forehead were caught up on her hand, and she quickly dismissed them by shaking her hand down towards the ground where you lay. The first drop lands several yards away, but it doesn't take more than than drop to catch your attention. The next drop you could practically hear coming, and you look up for a split second, just to watch the liquid bomb of salty sweaty crash directly into you, covering you in it's sinewy stickiness. The single drop of sweat from the goddess above you dwarfed most of your body. It was time to leave.

But just as you did, yet another peril lingers...that foot had begun to tap, the first of which coming immediately after the sweat drop bomb. The displaced air from that single tap was more than enough to blow your clothes around. Getting any closer to Hope's powerful feet could be fatal. But similarly, the height of the treads, easily tall enough for you to walk under and stare up at the sole of the shoe itself, could provide you some protection from any more falling threats, should Hope be sweating more profusely than you expected, or wanted.

So you have an option, run far from Hope's tapping foot to avoid being crushed, or use that same foot to take refuge under until the threat of being drowned into Hope's sweat drops has passed.
151232.title: in front of the goalie net

choices: Head for Hope's huge, bare foot to get help now.
Climb the shoe string and trying to get her attention later.
1512321.content:
Torn between death by drowning and death by crush, you make the first decision you can think of...head for the relative safety of Hope's gigantic cleat.

The treads themselves towered over you as if you were walking into a parking garage, the sole of her shoe raised far above your head like the ceiling of some tall building. As you make the last few steps of your mad dash to safety, you hear several loud, wet crashes behind you. Peeking over your shoulder, you catch a glimpse of Hope's sweat drops as they splash onto the dirt you stand on, right where you had been seconds ago. Each drop was easily the size of a small vehicle, had you been hit with one of those, you would have been knocked unconscious, if not worse.

Confident in your decision to hide under Hope's cleat, you take a deep breath and consider the situation. Hope hasn't moved much yet, and youre not sure why, but you take this moment of curious serenity for all it's worth. Approaching one of the huge treads that are currently supporting the weight of the woman above you, you place your hand against the surface. It's black, made of a very hard rubber. It's also got a pretty good bit of wear and tear on it. From this tiny perspective you can see all the scratches and dings in it's surface as if they were screaming at you.

You hear a deep rumbling, and for a moment you think that Hope is about to move. Looking way up, the sole of her cleat between the treads seems to be moving around some, as it was being pushed up and down. You must be directly under Hope's toes, and she must be wiggling them inside of her shoe. This is yet another moment where your tiny size is painfully brought to the forefront of your mind, reminding you of how dire your situation really is.

After a moment, she stopped wiggling her toes, and you decide to do more exploring.

Walking along the length of her sole further, you stare up at the magnificent sky of shoe sole like a child admiring the stars. Similarly, you even try making out your own constellations from the more intricate tread marks that reside on the sole itself, separate from the spike treads that dig into the Earth around you. It's not long before you realize you are passing along the arch of her foot now, and can even see her other shoe, miles away, to your right.

Whatever Hope was doing, it sure was taking a while. You'd been walking for nearly ten minute it felt like, and were still dead center of the arch of the shoe. But just as you are thinking this, that deep, thick rumbling from Hope's foot moving around inside her shoe returns. However, this time, it doesn't stop. It gets stronger, and louder, until youre sure something strange is about to happen.

The treads seem to suddenly dig deeper into the ground, and before you know it, huge, thick ropes as thick as redwood trees swing down from the heavens and crash into the ground on either side of the shoe. They are white, slightly dingy, and woven very tightly. It doesn't take you long to realize that they are her shoe strings.

Another loud thud directs your attention towards the heel of her shoe, where the other shoe has position it's toe against the surface of the shoe. Seconds later, you hear Hope's foot pulling out of the shoe.

However, her socked-foot down not appear. You look around in every direction, seeing no sign of the giant soccer player's foot. As you begin to reevaluate all of this, you see a shadow forming just outside of the safety under her shoe. Youre not sure what it is, until the displaced wind, and it's accompanying scent gives it away. Hope's now bare foot crashing into the grass next to it's adjacent shoe. She must have immediately taken her sock off before putting her foot down. But...where is her sock? Your answer comes in the form of more rustling above you, she must have shoved it inside the shoe.

Hope returns to a one legged stance as she prepares to remove the other shoe and sock, preferring to walk back to the locker room barefoot, with the grass tickling her feet. Her warm, musky, powerful foot now rests inches away from you, it's toes wiggling violently as they attempt to balance the impossibly huge woman. It's hard to imagine that this was the foot you were wandering around under only minutes ago.

But you don't have long, Hope will probably be leaving soon...will you head for her foot, in order to make contact, or climb her shoe string and climb aboard her shoe, and ride it out of the soccer field?
1512321.title: Hide under Hope's cleat, between the treads!

15123211.content: But which part of Hope's foot do you reach first?
15123211.title: Head for Hope's huge, bare foot to get help...

choices: grabbed her socks to throw in her bag
knocked her cleats to the floor by mistake
15123212.content:
Gripping onto the lace that swung loosely at the side of Hope’s discarded cleat, you dug your fingers into the woven fabric of the string, desperate to hold on for the trip to come. As Hope picked up her cleats and began heading for the lockers, you began your ascent. With each step the massive goalie took, your dangling bridge shook violently, swaying side to side so quickly that you were surprised you had yet to be thrown off. While the swinging made your stomach do back-flips, you knew that you couldn’t afford to stay still on her laces, you needed to make a move while there was still time! Looking up, you saw her fingers tucking inside the heel section of her cleats, you would need to get there at least in order to even have a chance of being discovered by her, you began climbing as your body shivered from the rush of adrenaline going through it.

With each pull of your arms, you inched your way up the impossibly long stretch of shoe-lace hanging below Hope’s cleat. As you made it to the height of the sole of her cleat, you gulped, seeing clumps of mud and grass easily the size of hills hanging so helplessly from her cleat’s spikes. The severity of your size difference stared you in the face as you swung into one of these mud mounds, coating you in a layer of thick wet earth.

“Great, now I need a bath when this is all done!” you griped as you began to see the tongue of her cleat in sight above you.

As you surmounted the top of Hope’s cleat, you began swaying just out of reach of the tongue of the cleat. With every step, it came just inches away from your position on her lace, but only for an instant! When it swung closer to you again, you leapt….landing right on the tongue of her cleat!

“Whoa!” you shouted as you grabbed onto the tongue of Hope’s cleat, trying not to fall into the void of her shoe that you now hovered over. Looking down into the massive pit, you felt your stomach nervously pinch. Her sock, shoved in haphazardly, was still the size of a large building to you; the cleat dwarfed it by far. Hit by a gust of wind by the inside of her cleat, your body was almost knocked clean off her cleat. Unfortunately, something worse happened….

BOOM!

You screamed as Hope put her cleats down, making you fall inside! As you fell onto the floor of her cleat, you looked up to see that you were in the bottom of her sock. Hope towered over you as she….
15123212.title: The Amazing Lace!

choices: you decided to try to rip a hole in the sock to get out
you needed to wait for Hope to come and move the bag again
151232121.content:
You panicked as you tumbled around inside Hope’s sweat drenched socks. The now thick fabric was swollen with the salty liquid from Hope’s feet. Your footsteps splashed with each step, like you were running through the rain-soaked streets. You could hear the “pitter-patter” of your feet on her wet socks as Hope began getting changed outside your prison. Running towards the thin columns of light that shined into your prison, you prayed to God that Hope would stay busy long enough that you could climb out of her socks and back into her line of sight.

“Hope! Look down! It’s me! I’m he-” you began to shout as you ran into the light; only to see Hope’s fingers reaching for your prison. You swallowed hard as you saw her fingers pluck at the edge of your cotton prison and pull up.

FOOMP!

You landed in the toe section of Hope’s sock once again as she pulled it loose from the interior of her cleat. The sweaty fabric pressed against your back as you found yourself cradled in the toe-section of the sock. Clothes soaked in the foul smelling liquid; your nostrils burnt like someone had lit a flame in your nostrils.

“Whew! These are more rank than usual!” you heard Hope say as you felt like you were still suspended in the air. At least you knew that you weren’t the only one who thought her feet smelt terribly after practice. Wait! She was close enough to smell them… you thought for a moment maybe she could hear you too!

“Hope! Look in the sock! I’m stuck in here!” you shouted as you felt your prison begin to move again. Your heart hammered, hoping at any second you would see Hope reaching in for you. As her face appeared over the opening of the sock, your spirits soared….only to drop as you saw she wasn’t looking at you, but something behind you instead!

CRASH!

Hope had dropped her socks into her bag…totally missing your pleas for help. But that wasn’t the end of it yet.

BOOM!.....BOOM!

The light coming into the sock was cut off as Hope’s discarded cleats crashed into the bag, sealing you into her fetid sock.

“You’ve got to be fucking with me,” you said under your breath as you struggled through the sock, guided only by the thin light which seeped in through the fabric. You reached where the cleat had crashed down and tried to find a way past, but it was no use…you were stuck in here until someone, or something moved that cleat. You felt the heat rise in the sock as the bag was sealed up, leaving you darkness as Hope went off to shower before heading home. Lying back against the cleat, your brain buzzed as you tried to think up a plan. The way you saw it, there were only two options left to you….
151232121.title: Bagging Her Prize

15211.content: You wake up in a dark and smelly place. You hear muffled voices and get jostled around every few seconds. You finally come to a halt and a bright light nearly blinds you. You now notice your surroundings.....a pair of white sneakers, flip flops. And other clothes giant sized. You're in a gym bag. You look up to see....
15211.title: In a gym bag

choices: a tiny person on her sole!
a tiny bug on the bottom of her foot
15212.content:
You felt nauseous as you finally woke up. The world around you was still spinning and turning at sickening speeds when you finally were able to open up your eyes. Shutting them tight, you held your body against the ground, trying to get your bearings straight again. The smell of wood and sweat was encrusted into the ground under you; it smelt like you were pitifully sprawled out on the floor of a gymnasium.

“Where the fuck am I?” you wonder breathlessly to yourself as you hear a sudden flurry of commotion around you.

“Alright, Jordyn, you’re the first on the bar for warm ups today, get started. I want to see the whole routine so we know it’s perfect for competition,” you heard a voice shout from the distance.

“Christ, doesn’t anyone notice a person passed out on the floor?” you wonder humorously to yourself. Pulling your body up a bit, you take a deep breath and shout, “Can somebody lend me a hand?”

“Jordyn, on the bar, now!” you heard the voice from before boom loudly.

BOOM!

You were shocked awake by an awe-inspiring crash behind you. As you were flipped onto your back, you opened up your eyes to see a massive young woman towering above you, Jordyn by your guess. Frantically, you began trying to back away from her, the massive woman who towered over you hadn’t even taken notice of your presence yet. You were too petrified to scream as she lifted her foot and began moving, bringing it down right on you!

BOOM!

You felt like pissing yourself as you miraculously landed between the giant woman’s toes. Staggering to your feet, you tried to make a break for it, but were too slow as her massive toes pinched you between them and began moving again. It felt like you were on the world’s most terrifying rollercoaster as you were released from the grip and slammed into the wooden bar.

CRASH!

You were tossed into the air once more as Jordyn’s heel slammed down not even an inch behind your body. Your blood turned to ice as you saw her heel drawfed your body, and that if you had been just the slightest bit closer, you would have been under it! Getting to your legs shakily, you tried to run away, but as Jordyn moved around on the bar again, you were struck in the back by her heel. You were sent tumbling through the air as you landed on the mat on the other end of the bar. Groggily you tried getting up as you heard the faint “THOOMP” sound of Jordyn finishing her routine. As you got to your feet, you felt like something was wrong. Looking up, you saw that the sky was replaced by Jordyn’s foot as she leapt of the bar.

THOOMP!

The gymnast looked down at her foot as she landed, unsure of what she had just felt. As she walked off the bar, she told her coach that she would be in the locker room for a moment. Sitting down on the bench, Jordyn looked at her foot and was surprised to see….
15212.title: Balance Beamed

1523.content: How about these two sports?
1523.title: Beach Volleyball/Figure Skating

choices: Somewhere in the Women's Locker room
15231.title: Beach Volleyball

choices: Beach Volleyball Champions Misty May Treanor and Kerri Walsh Jennings
152311.content:
You blink in surprise as you see an endless field of sand in front of you. Everything looks so much bigger. How exactly did you get here? The last thing you remember is being at the Olympics. You were offered a chance to meet your favorite beach volleyball players and get their autographs. One of the event organizers mentioned there would be a little bit of a catch to this but you assured them that you would do anything to meet your favorite female athletes. You were told to walk through a dark hallway and somehow you wound up here.

In your pocket you find a piece of paper…it reads:

Congratulation as a Women’s Beach Volleyball fan you’ve been chosen to play the game Secret Crush!

Here are the rules…

You’ve been shrunken down and placed in the middle of the beach volleyball field. None of the players are aware of your presence. Try not to get stepped on. Any girl that steps on you gets to keep you as her slave for the rest of your life. If you last the match without winding up underfoot, you’ll get the autographs of your favorite players.

Good Luck!!

Huh? Stepped on? Slave? Underfoot? This wasn’t exactly what you had in mind. “Wait I didn’t mean…” you start to complain. Unfortunately its too late for that. You here a whistle blow and see two pairs of gigantic pairs of bare feet enter the field.

Who do they belong to?
152311.title: On a Beach Volleyball Court

choices: You’re able to continue dodging the giant feet
You wind up getting stepped on by one of the players
1523111.content:
You stare up to see the two giantesses the feet belong to. It’s the legendary volleyball team of Misty May Treanor and Kerri Walsh Jennings. A team of women who were the 3 time Olympic champions and 4 time world champions competitors. Looking up at these two gigantic women is like looking up at a pair of sky scrapers. Each girl towers over you casting a huge shadow.

Without giving you any time to recover from your awe the whistle blows again and the women scramble to their positions with Misty May guarding the front left side of the net and Kerri Walsh taking the server position.

Kerri serves the ball and suddenly (everything goes crazy ). Female feet begin stomping everywhere as the women scramble to make sure the ball doesn’t land on their side of the net. You find yourself darting to the left and right just barely managing to avoid getting stepped on as the women intercept the ball passing to one another, bumping and spiking the ball over the net. It’s a terrifying experience. Every second a set of toes would crash down in front of you or you would leap out of the way to just in time to avoid getting squished under one of the giant girls heels. Sometimes the sole of a foot comes down right next to you as one of the women landed from a jump.

Of the two volley ball players Kerri Walsh’s feet are the most intimidating. You read somewhere that the 6’3” blond wore size 11 ½ -12 shoes. Even at your normal size you would consider them abnormally large but at your current height they make you want to wet your pants. That’s not to say that Misty May Treanor’s feet are unimpressive. Estimating them to be size 9 you find yourself shivering at the thought of being stepped on by them as well. It’s really amazing how fast both women can move. They are able to protect any area of the field almost instantaneously. Added onto that the large size of their feet allow them to cover more area in a single step then you can run. If they stepped in the right place you wouldn’t be able to escape their feet no matter how fast you moved.

Just by luck, you manage to avoid getting trampled by the two girls in the first round of volleys and after a few minutes the whistle blows again. Jennings and Treanor have managed to score the first point. The game stops momentarily as the girls reset their positions for the next serve.

Panting heavily you gaze around exhausted from dodging the first wave of feet. There are giant footprints all over the wet sand of the field where the girls have stepped. You stare at one of the enormous impressions of Kerri Walsh feet shuddering terribly relieved that that the sand wasn't you.

All too soon…the game continues.


How does the next part of the game play out?
1523111.title: The Legendary Dream Team

15231112.content:
The whistle blows and like before you find yourself scrambling to avoid giant feet as they begin stepping all around you. You do your best running, swerving and diving out of the way any time one of the women’s feet get close to you but you’re already exhausted from the first wave of dodging. You manage to avoid getting stepped on for a couple of times before your luck runs out. You are catching your breath from a particularly close call where you narrowly avoided Misty’s heels almost squashing you as she landed from a jump when you suddenly see Kerry Walsh’s foot come towards you.

Swoosh!!!

“Oof” You wheeze as her toes connect with your stomach sending you flying into the air. You land on your back several paces from your original location.

“Ugn,” You groan as you lay there for a couple of seconds. You rub your forehead as you attempt to get your bearings. The blurriness of your vision clears just in time for you to see the giant shadow looming over you. As you glance you see the sole of a female foot coming towards you.

That’s not good, you think.

Whap!!!

Everything seems to go in slow motion. You manage to stand just as the sole descends upon you. It’s soft but firm. The ball of the foot smacks into your face once again knocking you onto your back with a powerful amount of force. The arch of the foot positions itself over you and you feel your body press into it. It doesn't hurt as much as you expect. The sand cushions most of the impact so most of what you feel is the pressure of foot pressing against you. You feel the pressure build as you’re force to endure the athlete’s full weight.

Whose foot is it that is standing on you?
15231112.title: Stepped On!!

15232.content: Who will be the giant figure skater finding you tiny?
15232.title: Figure Skating

choices: By a miracle she spots you!
1523211.content: You were just one of the fans eager to see some of your favorite figure skaters on the ice like all the rest but something went horribly wrong and after mysteriously blacking out you awoke on the ice ranks itself for some reason your head was spinning like crazy and you noticed everything was bigger way bigger the stands and people in them at least had to be thousands of feet tall then it hit you:you're shrunk! Then a deep loud voice in a loudspeaker crying a loud announcement you can barely hear to the roars and applause from the hundreds of people looking like gigantic living statues then a huge figure dressed in a blue skating outfit came racing in your direction judging from her face which at your puny size was hard as heck to see her razor sharp ice blades cutting up the thick layer just in front of you "I got to get her attention whoever she is!" You thought taking a major leap as much as you could far the ice was slick as hell onto her huge white boot looking up the giantess' long sexy legs then finally as you struggled to stay on her constant swinging foot you saw her face "Oh my God it's Sasha Cohen!" You cry out as she performed her perfect routines over and over getting a solid 8.5 then 9.0 from the judges in the corner you desperately tried to get her attention "Hey Ms.Cohen! Please look down here! Ms. Cohen on your foot look!"
1523211.title: On the ice

15232111.content: Just as all seems lost by a lucky chance the giant ice figure skater sees you and letting out a tiny "Ohh!"quickly scoops you up but what does she do with you either keep you to herself or let you go?
15232111.title: By a miracle she spots you!

152321111.content: Thinking quickly the giant Ms. Cohen stuffs you in her bra and continues her spectacular routine while whispering "Stay still please I'll try to help you!" you nod and complies after she finishes and the event ends and the ice skater takes you to the locker room plucking you out of her breasts studying you out"How did you get this way?" she asks curiously "I have no clue!" you tell her and after thinking it over she decides "Well okay I'm going keep you
152321111.title: Keep you for herself

choices: The figure skaters skate on you
152321112.content: She laughs as she then drops you on the ice for her and the other figure skaters to skate on.
152321112.title: leave you on the ice

choices: You get out of the way
15232112.content: Unfortunately she couldn't hear you over the noise from the rink and because your small. You fall off her foot onto the ice as she does her routine you look in horror as you see her skating back towards you, you had to move or else she would run you over with her skates.
15232112.title: Can't see you

152322.content: You are in a unknown place pitch black and with lots of stuff like water bottles,keys,daily notebook schedules and stuff like that you can barely move a inch as your world is revolving around 360 degrees and you are bit bruised by dozens of stuff attempting to crush you flat it is then you realize you're tiny! Then you hear a pair of voices loud echoing voices one female the other male sounding like a young woman and a older man husband and wife maybe then sudden light blinds you as the large gym bag zips open and a huge hand grabs a huge cell phone next to you and you automatically grab onto the index finger as you're lifted up to see the large billboard face of ice figure skater Emily Hughes looking similar to Godzilla except you're tiny does she notice you?
152322.title: Emily Hughes

15311.content:
Your head was spinning. You felt like you would vomit at any moment from the intense nausea you felt. Looking around, you had no idea where you were. The only thing you knew was that you were in some kind of deep trouble, with your arms and legs restrained. Straining, you tried to break free from the bonds on you, but they were much stronger than you imagined. It was like you had been laminated to the floor! As you started shouting for help, the ground below you began to tremble.

As the tremors become more violent, a towering figure casts a shadow on you. You wet yourself as you realize you are in the presence of a colossal Kara Goucher smirks down at you.
“Well, it looks like the little cheater is finally awake,” she said glaring down at you. As her brown hair swept about her head, you thought she looked like a mountain with storm clouds around the peak. “You really think I didn’t notice you pay off the ref so you could get that early lead with no penalty? I was one race away from setting a new record, and now, thanks to you, three years of work are ruined!” She boomed as her foot slammed down next to you.

You stuttered to respond, “Kara! I have no idea what you’re talking-”

“Zip it pipsqueak!” She boomed as her foot hovered over you. “I hope you like my flip flop bug, and I pray you love my feet. Because you’re about to get to know them better than anyone on this planet. I’ll show you how a real athlete practices for races, you little shit.”

You watched as her foot descended onto you! As her massive toes passed by over your head, you could smell the fresh scent of soap. She must have just come out of the shower… which could only mean she was on her way to a workout! As the ball of her foot rested on you, you could feel the weight of her body ready to snap you in half! You struggled under her sole, only bringing a small giggle from your rival’s lips.

“Let’s see, I guess we should start by…”
15311.title: Cheaters Never Win

choices: tied up in my laces while I walk home.
licking it clean, I want my sneakers spotless.
153112.content:
“Ok, bug, let’s get changed into something more comfortable for the way home, ok?” Kara said as she slipped off her shirt, making sure to supply pressure to your tiny body under her foot. Kara smiled as she twisted and grinded her foot against your body. The feeling of your little form squirming under the ball of her foot sent shivers up her spine; this was a feeling she could get used to. For you, it was absolutely terrible underneath her foot! The pressure had your body feeling like it could pop at any moment. Kara’s foot wasn’t exactly minty fresh either. Sweat had begun soaking into your clothes from the moment her foot first made contact with you. Now, you were soaked to the bone by her sweat, hoping that this monstrous foot would be lifted off of you soon. As her foot began twisting back and forth, you cried out in pain, writhing beneath her.

“Mmmmm, keep up that delicious massage bug, I just might let you off my flip flops if you do,” Kara said, unaware that the pleasant sensation coming from the sole of her foot wasn’t intentional. Kara’s words were lost on you as the constant grinding of her foot began pulling your body in directions it was not meant to go.

POP!

You screamed, bloody murder, as one twist tore your left arm from its socket. Wriggling like a snake, you beat and pounded against the ball of Kara’s foot. Determined to dig through her flesh if need be. Of course, to Kara, your desperate struggles were nothing but soothing. Her tired sole practically was in ecstasy as your wild movements alleviated her stress. As you thought Kara was about to crush your body at any moment, a miracle took place. Her foot lifted off of you.

“Looks like someone has finally taken a liking to being in their proper place,” Kara teased as she flexed her toes over your head. She gripped your head between her toes as she lifted you up off the flip flop. “Kiss my foot, bug, or I’ll squeeze,” she threatened. You took no time at all as you kissed her foot, getting the taste of it in your mouth.

“Kara! Please let me go!” You shouted up at her between kisses.

“Whatever you say, buggy,” Kara said as her toes released their hold on you. You screamed as you fell onto the tongue of Kara’s sneaker. The smell from months of use was tangling with your nose, impairing it dangerously.

“Get used to this, buggy, because your next job is going to be…”
153112.title: Changing Feelings

1531121.content:
Kara’s massive fingers deftly picked you up, bringing you to the athlete’s face. As you hung loosely by the arm before her eyes, Kara couldn’t help but let out a small giggle. “You look so helpless like that bug, it’s a good look for you,” she said as she poked your tiny body curiously.

“Kara! Please let me go! I promise I won’t tell anyone about this! You won’t ever see me again!” you pleaded as your arm began to grow numb in Kara’s grip.

“Now why would I want to let my new toy go?” Kara asked as she began to lower you.

“What are you going to do with me?” you asked, terrified as you headed towards her feet once again.

“I’m making sure you’re all ready for our jog home, silly bug” Kara said, smiling widely. You were at a loss for words as you fell onto the tongue of Kara’s sneakers. As you fell to the mesh fabric on the tongue of her sneaker, you quickly lost your footing, your legs falling into the various holes dotting the area.

“Kara! This is nuts! You need to let me go!” you shouted as you desperately struggled to get off of her sneaker. But to your horror, Kara could no longer hear your small voice, or she no longer cared. Her powerful hands gripped laces the size of bridge cables, twisting them above you. You watched as the large chords began pressing down into the fabric, it was like watching a steamroller in slow motion. It was impossible to move in time as the chords slammed down into you, pressing you powerfully into her sneaker. You screamed as the pressure bent your arm even further out of place!

“Ok bug, it’s time to go home, don’t worry, it’s only a thirty minute jog!” she said as she finished tying her laces and standing up. Tapping her feet a few times to get the sneakers in place, Kara began her long jog home….

It was hell on her sneaker for that time! The heat of the day beat down on you mercilessly, as drops of sweat from Kara rained down onto you! On several occasions, you found yourself chocking up a lungful of her sticky sweat, as it threatened to drown you with each droplet. With each step, you were flung up until your safety bar of shoelace caught you in the stomach, knocking the wind out of you. You were then thrown down mercilessly into the shoe’s fabric as her foot landed. You watched as her leg took the shock of every step, the wave of force going up her toned legs.

After what seemed like an eternity, Kara finally made it to her front door. As the star athlete got back to her home, she kicked off her shoes (and you) letting you fly across the room. Your tiny body falls out of her laces, lying nearly dead on the floor. The ground begins rumbling, as Kara approaches. As she kicks over her shoe with her sock-clad foot, the runner plants her sweaty sole on you.

“Ok bug, now the real fun can start. I’m all sweaty after that run, so why don’t we…..?”
1531121.title: The Amazing Lace!

15311211.content:
“How does a shower sound buggy?” Kara asked as she removed her socked foot from your face. As you struggled to breathe regularly again, you almost couldn’t believe what you had heard. A shower? With Kara? Maybe you were finally getting a reward for living through that hell! Maybe Kara was going to be nice to you from now on! You tentatively reached your arm up as Kara reached down to pluck you up off the ground.

“Oh, now look at who’s willing to listen to orders,” Kara teased as she picked you up. “Maybe I should always let you know that if you do well you get to shower with me, I might get a lot more work out of you that way!”

You stayed obediently in Kara’s grasp as she walked towards the bathroom. As she entered, and placed you down on the counter, you watched, mesmerized, as she slowly undressed. You watched as her slender fingers plucked off her socks, peeling them from her legs. You saw as her pants and panties fluttered to the ground, shortly followed by her shirt and bra. Standing in front of the nude figure of Kara, you felt like you were the luckiest person on Earth for the first time since this hell started. Kara laid her hand flat out in front of you as she said, “hop on little one, it is time for the fun to start!”

Jumping on, you fell as she began to move her hand, falling onto her fingers. As Kara entered the shower, you were placed down on the side next to a loofa the size of a large bolder. You drank in every inch of her body as the water began cascading down her naked form. Reaching for her loofa, Kara accidently grabbed hold of you as well! As you were lifted high into the air, you grabbed hold tight of the spongy object, praying you wouldn’t fall off. You watched as a fresh bar of soap was fast approaching her body! Without the slightest care in the world, Kara began rubbing the bar of soap all over herself, form her chest to her toes, lathering herself all over. Your show was cut short as Kara held the loofa (and you) under the water. Your time to watch was over.

Suddenly, you were surprised to find yourself once again at Kara’s feet as she began to scrub them with your assistance. You struggled as her hands slowly worked you and the loofa from the top of her ankle, down to the tips of her toes. Turning her foot over, you got a full taste of her sweaty soles as she rubbed you headfirst against them. Soon, you found your head bobbing up between her toes as Kara meticulously scrubbed every inch of her foot. As she dragged the loofa down her sole to her heel, you could feel yourself getting more and more aroused as her skin brushed against you, but as she began twisting and grinding you against her heel, the feeling faded fast. You knew you couldn’t take much more of this and began beating on Kara’s heel, praying she took notice of you.

“Well, you’re an eager one aren’t you? Jumping on before I even said to!” Kara said as she stopped scrubbing her foot and brought the loofa to eye level. She giggled at you as you clung tightly to the fabric. “You look so cute when you’re helpless like that, so you’re going to have to stay like that a little longer buggy. I don’t know how you’ll like this next part, but I sure will!” she said as she lifted her arm into the air….

FOOMP!

You were slammed immediately into Kara’s armpit. “Enjoy buggy, this always stinks after I run,” Kara giggled as she began rubbing you into her soft flesh. The smell wasn’t an exaggeration, your nose burned uncontrollably as her sweaty skin rubbed up against you. You tried pushing away from her skin, only to slip on the wet flesh and end up buried face-first in it. The taste got in your mouth as you had to open it to breath! You began spitting, trying to rid yourself of the taste as Kara switched arms, burying you even deeper in her other pit. She rubbed you in small circles, making sure you almost buffed her armpit clean! As you thought she was going to crush you against it, she pulled away, bringing you again to her face.

“Alright buggy, now for your real reward!” she shouted as she lowered the loofa to her toned, tight, perfect ass. “Make sure to lick it as I scrub, I want my butt spotless!” she said as she pressed you into her soft cheeks. You wasted no time, as you quickly took to the task she gave you, licking in small spurts as she rubbed every inch of her rear. She was kind enough to rub only the outer cheeks, saving between them for a time when you wouldn’t be along for the ride. As you skirted across the edge of her cheeks, you couldn’t help but think that you could stay this way forever. You could even bare her feet if you got to cuddle with her ass every night! But your bliss was ended as Kara pulled you away from her glorious gluteus to her face.

Giving you a mischievous grin, Kara told you that she had one more task for you when the shower was done. “Ok buggy, when we get out, I need you to…”
15311211.title: A Clean Slate

153112112.content:
“Help you do what?” you said as you looked up at Kara in shock. You looked up at the soaking wet figure of Kara as she finished washing the rest of the soap and shampoo off of her body. Looking down at you, the Olympic athlete couldn’t help but giggle at your little form in her hand.

“Help me clean my ears, come on little one, don’t tell me I need to clean yours first so you can obey my orders better,” Kara joked as she turned off the water to the shower. You watched as Kara placed you down on the sink counter and wrapped a towel around her body. Looking down at you, she smiled and reached out her hand, pinching you gently between her fingers.

“What exactly do I need to do?” you asked, growing fearful of Kara once again.

“Just hold on tight little one, I’ll take care of the rest,” Kara said as she lifted you to her ear. “Oh, and if you begin shouting in my ear, I will squish you on the spot bug. Just so we are clear.”

With that, you found yourself plunging face first into Kara’s ear. Your upper body was pounded against the top of her ear, as she dragged your face across the ridges, swirling you around until you finally approached the outside of her ear canal.

“Do well little one,” she said as she plunged you into the darkness. It was a grueling experience as Kara’s fingers began plunging you deep into her ear canal. Within seconds of penetration, you were already coated in her ear wax. Then, you felt pain ripple through your abdomen as she began to spin you around inside. You clenched your teeth, wanting to scream, but afraid to do so. You could feel your arms becoming heavy with the natural wax as Kara began plunging you in and out of her ear for a final sweep. Your legs felt like they would pop out of their sockets as she quickly pulled you out of one ear and switched hands to dip you into another.

“Kara! Please stop! I can’t take this!” you shouted as she brought you to her other ear.

“Calm down you baby, you’re already half way done. Just shut up and hold on,” she said as she shoved you into her ear and began the process once again. When you were finally pulled out of Kara’s second ear, you were coated in her ear wax, like a yellowish snowman. As she placed you into the sink and turned the water on so you could wash up, you saw her busily brushing her teeth. After dodging a few of her spits, Kara pulled you out and began looking around the counter for something.

“Kara? What’s wrong?” you asked, slightly afraid.

“NO fucking dental floss,” she said, slamming her hand down on either side of you frustrated. Heaving an exasperated sigh, Kara looked down at you wearily. As you shuffled uneasily under her gaze, you saw a smile suddenly spread across her face. You grew even more afraid. Her fingers were quickly around you again as Kara lifted you above her head. Tilting her face up at you, she gave a sexy moan as she licked her lips. As her maw opened wide, you could feel yourself being lowered down towards it. You began struggling intensely as Kara gently brought you into her mouth, closing her lips behind you. As you ran to the edge of her mouth, her teeth clacked down and her tongue knocked you over, pinning you to the roof of her mouth.

“Kara! Please don’t eat me! I swear I don’t taste good!” you shouted. You were released as Kara’s tongue fell to respond.

“I’m not going to eat you little one, you’re going to be my new dental floss is all,” Kara said as she opened her lips to let in light. “Look and clean between all of my teeth, anything you find toss in my throat, I’ll take care of it in the end,” she said as she opened her mouth wide for you.

As you looked into Kara’s mouth, you watched as the florescent lights made her saliva shimmer. You wasted no time getting to work as you ran over to her teeth and began checking between them with your tiny arms. The steps were the same for every obnoxiously large tooth. First you would approach it and examine behind and in front of it for any food let over. Next, you dug your arm between her teeth and reached around for anything that had failed to make it to her stomach on the first attempt. When you got your hands on something, you carefully pulled it out and tossed it down her awaiting throat. After a half hour of checking, you shouted to Kara that you were done.

“Great job little one, now time to get rid of the junk,” she said as she closed her mouth, with you still inside! You ran to the front of her mouth, only to get knocked down by her tongue as she proceeded to….
153112112.title: Getting an Ear Full

choices: Reached into her mouth to pull you out
Gathered her saliva for the inevitable "Gulp!"
15312.content:
The ground of the locker room was cold as you stood there, waiting for help to arrive. The security measures at this gym were nuts, you thought. What kind of psychotic place shrinks people who come into the locker room without a membership card!? You kicked at the ground as you wondered how on Earth you would end up getting the attention of anyone who walked in, from your observations; you were only as big as an ant at the moment.

CLUNK!

You jumped as you heard the heavy lock mechanism on the door open, someone was coming in! Now was your chance to get help! You readied yourself, standing in the middle of the floor so that you had the best chance of being seen.

BOOM!....BOOM!....BOOM!....BOOM!....BOOM!

The rhythmic pounding of footsteps echoed through the empty room. You stood in awe as the impressive figure of Kara Goucher turned the corner, towering well above the Manhattan skyscrapers you grew up around. You looked up her long legs to see her face eagerly engaged in chewing on a protein bar. As her jaws worked the chewy bar into a swallow able size, you began shouting at her feet for her attention.

Her sneaker clad feet soared over your head, obviously you had been missed. As she took a seat on the bench, she began taking off her shoes, the bar still in her mouth. Or at least until she bit down too much. You didn’t know what hit you as the sticky protein bar landed on you, grabbing hold of you with a mixture of Kara’s saliva, the bar’s sugars, and whatever else was holding it together. You quickly found yourself brought into the air, and before Kara’s wide open mouth as she put the bar back in.

CRUNCH!

You fell face first into Kara’s slippery tongue as her teeth sliced through the heavy bars thick body. As you were clumsily tossed to her teeth by Kara’s tongue, you shook in fear. As her teeth slowly broke the bar to pieces, her serpentine tongue began to investigate your body, licking it up and down thoroughly. You began to cry as a long, “Mmmmmm” echoed through Kara’s mouth. She had grown attached to your flavor. As her stomach rumbled, you cringed, wondering when you would be sent below. As Kara’s tongue took another long lick of your body, you trembled, hitting back at it. Her tongue jumped away, shocked. Time froze as Kara….
15312.title: Don't Worry, It Adds Protein

choices: Sweep her track shoes (and you) into her bag to go home.
Strip off those socks, her feet were killing her!
15323.content:
Looking around, you shuddered as you found yourself in the middle of a valley of metallic towers. Your friends plan to sneak into the locker room was stupid from the start, you knew that, but now it just seemed plain idiotic. It was partly your fault though; you never did ask him how much of the formula you should drink. From your new perspective, it was clear you had drunken too much!

As you continued to stare at the new, larger world around you in confusion, a new sensation began to permeate your body. It was a rhythmic vibrating, like an earthquake with a sense of beat. As the vibrations became more powerful with each passing second, you realized that there was a loud crashing sound to accompany it. Suddenly, it hit you as to what the mysterious sensation was…it was the feeling of a person walking towards you! As the towering form of Lolo Jones soon eclipses the harsh lights on you, you realize just how dumb this plan really was.

BANG!

A sharp explosion of sound echoed behind you as Lolo’s discarded sneakers slammed onto the bench. Looking up, you saw her long legs bend as she planted her tired feet onto the bench. You watched as her toes pushed resentfully against her tight socks, waiting for the chance to breathe! The intense smell of her feet was enough to make you feel queasy, and their intimidating size didn’t help calm you down.

As you backed away from her feet, you failed to notice that Lolo was about to…
15323.title: Hiding in Plain Sight

choices: made it up just in time!
153231.content:
Frustrated, Lolo began dumping stuff from her locker onto the bench you were precariously perched upon. You watched as shirts, shorts, and other objects clattered onto the bench, knocking you dreadfully off balance. As you crashed onto your ass, you watched a very angry Lolo looked down at the mess she made in disgust. Wordlessly, she grabbed her duffel bag and slammed it down behind you on the floor. You looked down into the cavernous canvas carrier, wondering when the Olympian would calm down enough for you get in touch with her. You watched as Lolo angrily tossed in used shirts and shorts into the bag, making little headway in the pile she had so quickly accumulated. As you took another glance into the slowly filling bag, Lolo let out a grunt of anger as she slammed her arm down onto the bench.

“Fuck organization!” you heard her rant under her breath as she swept her arm across the bench….right at you! It was like trying to outrun and oncoming bullet-train, you thought as Lolo’s clothing slammed into you. You struggled to keep awake as you fell into the darkness of her bag, under an avalanche of clothing.

ZIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIP!

You groaned as the light from above was closed out with a quick flick of Lolo’s arm. You fried moving, but found your lower body was pinned under something hard. Looking around, you saw that you were dangerously trapped under the sole of Lolo’s sneaker! Struggling, you tried to pull yourself free, but the weight of the shoe was too much for you to move out from under. As the bag suddenly began to move around you, another large object crashed down in front of you in the darkness. The pungent odor that hit you next told you all you needed to know about the mystery object. Lolo’s sneakers had tag-teamed on you. While one pinned you, you now found yourself staring into the cavernous opening of the second, bathing you in the smell of Lolo’s feet! With each swing, you felt yourself drifting further and further into the darkness of sleep. The smell form Lolo’s sneaker sealed your fate as you passed out in her bag…

ZIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIP!

You were woken as powerful rays of light shown down on you. Without warning, gravity turned on you, or rather around you, as you began tumbling around in the bag! You felt like you were free-falling as… well you began to fall. You soon found yourself watching as massive articles of clothing fell into the hungry maw of Lolo’s washing machine! You ran on falling fabric bridges, leaping as separate shirts and shorts fell into the watery pit below. As you leapt onto one of her sports bras, you saw the edge of the washing machine before you! Sprinting on the cup, you jumped off, grabbing hold of the edge of the washing machine. You tried desperately to pull yourself up as Lolo adjusted the dials on the machine for her latest load of laundry. As the giant woman reached to close the lid, you….
153231.title: House Work

15511.content: You snuck in the WWE diva's locker room to get a chance to meet them all, but after you did, you suddenly shrank! A giant shoe lands next to you and it belongs to.....
15511.title: WWE

choices: jumped into the clothes she was gathering
1551121.content:
As you sat on the bench, waiting for the match to start, you felt your stomach churning uncomfortably. Your opponent was Lita, and for your debut, you never thought you would end up being cannon fodder for such an accomplished woman wrestler. You had always watched her matches because you looked up to her, and the thought of being held down by her on your debut was becoming too much for you to handle. Opening your locker, you looked down to see a small pill container with a note attached to it. Picking up the case, you looked at the note and read aloud, “Take two in case of nervousness.”

You smiled in relief, figuring it was a gift from your coach to help you get ready for today. Downing the pills in one gulp, you sat on the bench relieved as you felt an odd sensation pass over your body as you felt the pills travel down your throat. You closed your eyes as the sensation grew more intense by the second. It suddenly felt like your body had been dipped in cold water, knocking all the nerves out of you in a flash. Energized and excited, you opened your eyes….and realized you had a much bigger problem to worry about as your nerves came back tenfold.

The bench which had just moments ago comfortably fit your rear now stretched out on all sides of you like a suspension bridge. As you stood up and tried to figure out what to do, you heard the door to the locker room open and close as someone entered.

BOOM!....BOOM!....BOOM!...BOOM!

Her footsteps shook your bench as they drew closer and closer. You prayed to God above that she would just pass, but you were having no such luck. She was a scarlet tower as she entered your isle. Lita stood over you like a Greek Goddess as she took a seat before her locker, which was right next to yours. As he shapely ass hit the bench, the vibration knocked you on your rear, right before her bottom.

BOOM!

Looking up, you saw as Lita began stripping out of her street clothes and change into her gear. As her clothing fell all around you, it became apparent that you were left with only two options at this point. Either you could try and get her attention by hitting her ass before you, or try and take cover in the clothes behind you.

“Match is almost on Lita! Get Ready!” You heard her coach shout from the entrance. Lite grumbled as she continued getting changed. Time was running out for you.

As the giantess began slipping on the last of her gear you made your choice. Risky as it was, you…
1551121.title: Messing with the E-Lita

choices: She doesn't and lita leaves with you on her ass

After lita got to the ring she waited for 5 minutes getting very angry at you for not showing up. You hear say under her breath if she ever found you she would murder you and stomp you into the ground (metaphorically she doesn't know your stuck to her butt).
